verbs.description: [ARG1: another arrest for former stamford kitchen nightmares restaurant owner criminal charges] [V: continue] [C-ARG1: to mount for the former local restaurant owner who tried to save his failing italian eatery on national television last year in his most recent arrest settembre was charged with first - degree larceny three counts of illegal use of a credit card and two counts of third - degree larceny] stamford police sgt peter dispagna said police got several complaints from companies including one from dec 8 in which a company booked a christmas party at the restaurant and paid a 4 100 deposit on jan 7 investigators got a complaint from a corporation that booked a dec 17 holiday party and gave the restaurant 4 000 in two deposits for the party in the nov 12 episode of kitchen nightmares settembre displayed a volatile temper but later acquiesced to ramsay efforts at turning around his two - story italian restaurant sgt peter dispagna italian steakhouse restaurant gordon ramsay settembre sabatiello sammy settembre stamford vandalism sabatiello christmas
